title: Parents and teachers: is your school closing because of the UK heatwave?
description:
We’d like to hear whether schools in England and Wales may have to close amid extreme temperatures this and next week

With temperatures predicted to rise to up to 35 degrees over the coming days during a heatwave currently expected to peak on Monday or Tuesday, we’re keen to hear whether schools in England and Wales may have to close temporarily due to the extreme heat.

Continue reading...
